Package com.paiondata.aristotle.repository

Interface UserRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<User,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<User>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<User,Long>
@Repository public interface UserRepository extends org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<User,Long>
Repository interface for managing users using Neo4j. This interface provides methods for CRUD operations on users and their relationships.

  • Method Details

    • getUserByOidcid

      @Query("MATCH (u:User { oidcid: $oidcid }) RETURN u") User getUserByOidcid(String oidcid)
      Retrieves a user by their unique identifier (OIDC ID).
      Parameters:
      oidcid - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      the user

    • findAll

      @Query("MATCH (u:User) RETURN u") List<User> findAll()
      Retrieves all users.
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<User,Long>
      Specified by:
      findAll in interface org.springframework.data.neo4j.repository.Neo4jRepository<User,Long>
      Returns:
      a list of all users

    • checkOidcidExists

      @Query("MATCH (u:User { oidcid: $oidcid }) RETURN count(u)") long checkOidcidExists(String oidcid)
      Checks if a user with the given OIDC ID exists.
      Parameters:
      oidcid - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      the count of users with the given OIDC ID

    • createUser

      @Query("CREATE (u:User { oidcid: $oidcid, username: $username }) RETURN u") User createUser(@Param("oidcid") String oidcid, @Param("username") String username)
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      oidcid - the unique identifier of the user
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      the created user

    • updateUser

      @Query("MATCH (u:User { oidcid: $oidcid }) SET u.username = $username RETURN u") User updateUser(@Param("oidcid") String oidcid, @Param("username") String username)
      Updates the username of a user.
      Parameters:
      oidcid - the unique identifier of the user
      username - the new username of the user
      Returns:
      the updated user

    • deleteByOidcids

      @Query("MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.oidcid IN $oidcids DETACH DELETE u") void deleteByOidcids(List<String> oidcids)
      Deletes users by their OIDC IDs.
      Parameters:
      oidcids - the list of OIDC IDs of the users to be deleted

    • getGraphUuidsByUserOidcid

      @Query("MATCH (u:User) WHERE u.oidcid IN $oidcids WITH u MATCH (u)-[r:RELATION]->(g:Graph) RETURN g.uuid") List<String> getGraphUuidsByUserOidcid(List<String> oidcids)
      Retrieves the UUIDs of graphs associated with the given users.
      Parameters:
      oidcids - the list of OIDC IDs of the users
      Returns:
      the list of UUIDs of the graphs
